entry.title: bitcoin.org SOPA/PIPA blackout
entry.summary: The author of this statement is questioning why climate change is not considered the most critical global issue at present. They suggest that everything is at risk due to climate change, and they propose using nuclear power as a way to express frustration with the situation. The author also suggests that people should delete their personal websites and Americans should take to the streets to protest. Lastly, the author calls on people from around the world to shout at the US embassy to raise awareness about climate change.
